verses.kjv: And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lightened with his glory.
verses.web: After these things, I saw another angel coming down out of the sky, having great authority. The earth was illuminated with his glory.
verses.ct: After this, I saw another angel coming down from heaven. He had tremendous authority, and the whole earth was lit up by his glory.

verses.kjv: And he cried mightily with a strong voice, saying, Babylon the great is fallen, is fallen, and is become the habitation of devils, and the hold of every foul spirit, and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird.
verses.web: He cried with a mighty voice, saying, “Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great, and she has become a habitation of demons, a prison of every unclean spirit, and a prison of every unclean and hateful bird!
verses.ct: He shouted with a powerful voice: "Fallen! Fallen is Babylon the great! She has become a home for demons, a prison for every foul spirit, and a cage for every unclean and detestable bird!"

verses.kjv: For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication, and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her, and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the abundance of her delicacies.
verses.web: For all the nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality, the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality with her, and the merchants of the earth grew rich from the abundance of her luxury.”
verses.ct: "Every nation has drunk the wine of her furious immorality. The kings of the earth gave themselves to her sexually, and the merchants of the earth grew wealthy from her outrageous luxury."

verses.kjv: And I heard another voice from heaven, saying, Come out of her, my people, that ye be not partakers of her sins, and that ye receive not of her plagues.
verses.web: I heard another voice from heaven, saying, “Come out of her, my people, that you have no participation in her sins, and that you don’t receive of her plagues,
verses.ct: Then I heard another voice from heaven say, "Come out of her, my people! Don't participate in her sins, or you will share in her plagues."

verses.kjv: For her sins have reached unto heaven, and God hath remembered her iniquities.
verses.web: for her sins have reached to the sky, and God has remembered her iniquities.
verses.ct: "Her sins have piled up as high as heaven, and God has not forgotten her crimes."

verses.kjv: Reward her even as she rewarded you, and double unto her double according to her works: in the cup which she hath filled fill to her double.
verses.web: Return to her just as she returned, and repay her double as she did, and according to her works. In the cup which she mixed, mix to her double.
verses.ct: "Pay her back the way she paid others. Give her double for everything she has done. Fill her cup twice as full as she filled it for others."

verses.kjv: How much she hath glorified herself, and lived deliciously, so much torment and sorrow give her: for she saith in her heart, I sit a queen, and am no widow, and shall see no sorrow.
verses.web: However much she glorified herself, and grew wanton, so much give her of torment and mourning. For she says in her heart, ‘I sit a queen, and am no widow, and will in no way see mourning.’
verses.ct: "Match her torment and grief to the glory and luxury she gave herself. She tells herself, 'I sit as a queen. I'm no widow. I will never know sorrow.'"

verses.kjv: Therefore shall her plagues come in one day, death, and mourning, and famine; and she shall be utterly burned with fire: for strong is the Lord God who judgeth her.
verses.web: Therefore in one day her plagues will come: death, mourning, and famine; and she will be utterly burned with fire; for the Lord God who has judged her is strong.
verses.ct: "Because of this, her plagues will strike in a single day — death, mourning, and famine — and she will be completely consumed by fire. For the Lord God who judges her is mighty."

verses.kjv: And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her, shall bewail her, and lament for her, when they shall see the smoke of her burning,
verses.web: The kings of the earth who committed sexual immorality and lived wantonly with her will weep and wail over her, when they look at the smoke of her burning,
verses.ct: The kings of the earth who shared in her immorality and luxury will weep and wail over her when they see the smoke rising from her destruction.

verses.kjv: Standing afar off for the fear of her torment, saying, Alas, alas that great city Babylon, that mighty city! for in one hour is thy judgment come.
verses.web: standing far away for the fear of her torment, saying, ‘Woe, woe, the great city, Babylon, the strong city! For your judgment has come in one hour.’
verses.ct: They will stand far away, terrified by her torment, and cry out, "How terrible! How terrible for you, great city of Babylon, you mighty city! In a single hour your judgment has come!"

verses.kjv: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:
verses.web: The merchants of the earth weep and mourn over her, for no one buys their merchandise any more:
verses.ct: The merchants of the earth will weep and mourn over her, because no one buys their goods anymore —

verses.kjv: The merchandise of gold, and silver, and precious stones, and of pearls, and fine linen, and purple, and silk, and scarlet, and all thyine wood, and all manner vessels of ivory, and all manner vessels of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble,
verses.web: merchandise of gold, silver, precious stones, pearls, fine linen, purple, silk, scarlet, all expensive wood, every vessel of ivory, every vessel made of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble;
verses.ct: their cargo of gold, silver, precious stones, and pearls; fine linen, purple cloth, silk, and scarlet fabric; every kind of expensive wood; all sorts of ivory objects; every item crafted from the finest wood, bronze, iron, and marble;

verses.kjv: And cinnamon, and odours, and ointments, and frankincense, and wine, and oil, and fine flour, and wheat, and beasts, and sheep, and horses, and chariots, and slaves, and souls of men.
verses.web: and cinnamon, incense, perfume, frankincense, wine, olive oil, fine flour, wheat, sheep, horses, chariots, and people’s bodies and souls.
verses.ct: cinnamon, incense, perfume, and frankincense; wine, olive oil, fine flour, and wheat; cattle, sheep, horses, and chariots — and even human beings, bought and sold body and soul.

verses.kjv: And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.
verses.web: The fruits which your soul lusted after have been lost to you. All things that were dainty and sumptuous have perished from you, and you will find them no more at all.
verses.ct: "The luxuries your soul craved are gone from you. All your elegance and splendor have vanished, never to be found again."

verses.kjv: The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her, shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment, weeping and wailing,
verses.web: The merchants of these things, who were made rich by her, will stand far away for the fear of her torment, weeping and mourning,
verses.ct: The merchants who got rich from her will stand far away, terrified by her torment, weeping and mourning.

verses.kjv: And saying, Alas, alas, that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!
verses.web: saying, ‘Woe, woe, the great city, she who was dressed in fine linen, purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls!
verses.ct: They will cry out, "How terrible! How terrible for the great city that was dressed in fine linen, purple, and scarlet, and glittering with gold, precious stones, and pearls!"

verses.kjv: For in one hour so great riches is come to nought. And every shipmaster, and all the company in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood afar off,
verses.web: For in an hour such great riches are made desolate.’ Every ship master, and everyone who sails anywhere, and mariners, and as many as gain their living by sea, stood far away,
verses.ct: "In a single hour, all that wealth has been wiped out!" Every ship captain, every passenger, every sailor, and everyone who makes a living from the sea stood far away.

verses.kjv: And cried when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What city is like unto this great city!
verses.web: and cried out as they looked at the smoke of her burning, saying, ‘What is like the great city?’
verses.ct: They cried out as they watched the smoke of her burning: "What city was ever like this great city?"

verses.kjv: And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas, that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.
verses.web: They cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and mourning, saying, ‘Woe, woe, the great city, in which all who had their ships in the sea were made rich by reason of her great wealth!’ For she is made desolate in one hour.
verses.ct: They threw dust on their heads and wept and mourned, crying out, "How terrible! How terrible for the great city! Everyone who had ships on the sea grew rich from her wealth — and in a single hour she has been destroyed!"

verses.kjv: Rejoice over her, thou heaven, and ye holy apostles and prophets; for God hath avenged you on her.
verses.web: “Rejoice over her, O heaven, you saints, apostles, and prophets; for God has judged your judgment on her.”
verses.ct: "Celebrate over her, O heaven! Celebrate, you saints, apostles, and prophets! God has judged her for the way she treated you!"

verses.kjv: And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and cast it into the sea, saying, Thus with violence shall that great city Babylon be thrown down, and shall be found no more at all.
verses.web: A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea, saying, “Thus with violence will Babylon, the great city, be thrown down, and will be found no more at all.
verses.ct: Then a mighty angel picked up a boulder the size of a great millstone and hurled it into the sea, saying, "Just like this, the great city of Babylon will be violently thrown down and never be seen again."

verses.kjv: And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in thee; and no craftsman, of whatsoever craft he be, shall be found any more in thee; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee;
verses.web: The voice of harpists, minstrels, flute players, and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you. No craftsman, of whatever craft, will be found any more at all in you. The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you.
verses.ct: "The sound of harpists, musicians, flute players, and trumpeters will never be heard in you again. No craftsman of any trade will ever be found in you again. The grinding of a millstone will never be heard in you again."

verses.kjv: And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee: for thy merchants were the great men of the earth; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived.
verses.web: The light of a lamp will shine no more at all in you. The voice of the bridegroom and of the bride will be heard no more at all in you; for your merchants were the princes of the earth; for with your sorcery all the nations were deceived.
verses.ct: "The glow of a lamp will never shine in you again. The voices of a bride and groom will never be heard in you again. Your merchants were the most powerful people on earth, and your sorcery deceived every nation."

verses.kjv: And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.
verses.web: In her was found the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all who have been slain on the earth.”
verses.ct: "In her streets was found the blood of prophets and of saints — the blood of everyone who has ever been slaughtered on the earth."
